content.en: Optimization algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to optimize structures and solve reliability-based design optimization problems. These algorithms, such as the first-order reliability method (FORM) and sequential approximate programming approach, are used to improve the efficiency and accuracy of the optimization process. By incorporating probabilistic and non-probabilistic methods, as well as metaheuristic algorithms, these approaches aim to address uncertainties and achieve robust design optimization.
content.da: Optimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere strukturer og løse pålidelighedsbaserede designoptimeringsproblemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom førsteordens pålidelighedsmetoden (FORM) og sekventielle tilnærmede programmeringstilgange, anvendes til at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af optimeringsprocessen. Ved at inkorporere probabilistiske og ikke-probabilistiske metoder samt metaheuristiske algoritmer, sigter disse tilgange mod at håndtere usikkerheder og opnå robust designoptimering.
